content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal experience with regards to the potential earnings of freelance writers on these platforms. However, being part of an online community is an excellent way to network with other freelance writers who might have knowledge of high-paying gig opportunities or connections with clients or companies that match your skill set. In addition, many of these communities offer job boards or regularly updated lists of available freelance writing gigs that you would not otherwise have access to. Ultimately, the amount you earn as a freelance writer will depend on a variety of factors such as your experience, writing quality, and client preferences, and it may take time to find the best-paying opportunities.
